meanings.definition: Clothing worn for sports or physical exercise.
meanings.sent1: I need new sportswear for my soccer game.
meanings.sent2: She bought some new sportswear for her yoga class.
meanings.sent3: The dog tried to wear my sportswear for a run!
meanings.sent4: Her sportswear was like armor on the battlefield of the gym.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of her sportswear made her stand out on the track.

meanings.definition: The business of selling clothing designed for sports or physical exercise.
meanings.sent1: The sportswear industry is booming with new trends.
meanings.sent2: He works in sportswear and always knows the latest styles.
meanings.sent3: The aliens opened a sportswear shop on Mars!
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, sportswear reigns supreme.
meanings.sent5: The store window displayed the latest sportswear collection in vibrant colors.
